entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
